text: Egha datɨrɨghɨn uaghan gumazamizir kaba arazir kamɨn gɨn ghuavɨra iti. Me guizbangɨra Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ziam fer puvatɨ, egha me arazir God ifongeziba ko, bizir a damuasa me mɨkemeziba ko, Araziba ko, Akar Gavgaviba, me dar gɨn zuir puvatɨ, kar a Jekopɨn ovavir boribagh anɨngizir araziba. Jekop a gumazir kam, God ziar igharazir kam Israel a ganɨngi.
